snippet: Opponents said the Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement, designed to crack down on digital piracy, was not democratic.
abstract: European legislators reject the Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement, designed to crack down on digital piracy, saying it is not democratic; Internet freedom groups hail decision as a victory for democracy, but media companies lament it as a setback for the creative industries.
lead_paragraph: Opponents said the Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement, designed to crack down on digital piracy, was not democratic.

headline.print_headline: Europeans Reject Treaty To Combat Digital Piracy
